title: Enchanting Diamond and Emerald Kanti Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: High purity 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
Emerald center stones (pear and round cut
features: Intricate floral design with a central emerald and diamond pendant. The Kanti Haaram features delicate lattice work and is accented with lustrous pearl drops, creating a timeless and elegant design. The central pendant provides a focal point with its cascading form and balanced composition.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale social gatherings and special events where you want to make a statement.
description: This exquisite Diamond and Emerald Kanti Haaram is a testament to the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry craftsmanship. The meticulously hand-set diamonds and vibrant emeralds showcase exceptional artistry. The addition of South Sea Pearls adds a touch of sophistication and timeless elegance. It's a piece that will be treasured for generations, embodying both traditional beauty and modern style.
